sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_appn">
    <x_snc_nnemc0_appn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <appn_code>SCN</appn_code>
        <appn_desc>SCN funds are used for investments to finance the construction of new ships and conversion
of existing ships, including service life extensions and nuclear refueling overhauls. Included
in the SCN appropriation are hull, mechanical and electrical equipment, electronics, guns,
torpedo and missile launching systems, and communications systems. It also includes plant
equipment, ship outfitting and post delivery projects, machines, and tools. This appropriation
is a multi-year appropriation and normally remains available for obligation for five fiscal years
or the obligation work limiting date (OWLD) of the ship under construction. The OWLD is
established as 11 months following completion of fitting out the ship, and the OWLD date of
the last hull in a class of ships governs when the appropriation is scheduled to expire. </appn_desc>
        <appn_type>Shipbuilding and Conversion, Navy</appn_type>
        <number>APPN0001004</number>
        <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_appn</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 15:03:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>348ee35adb1d23008e9357935e9619aa</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 15:03:20</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_nnemc0_appn>
</record_update>
